name: Open Web Engine
short_description:
The main goal of this project is to create a safe, easy to use and flexible web engine.

This is a very young project, there is no test version yet, so I'll just sum up some aims here:
- core is written in php & MySQL
- safety is part of the design rather than being user-dependent
- upwards compatible
- the end user is assumed to be non-technical
- multiuser / wildcard functionality (compatible with all plugins)
- layout is 100% configurable
- theme functionality
- multi-language support

Some examples of websites that could be built with this engine:
- webshop
- wiki
- encyclopaedia
- social network
- web-rpg
- blog
- forum
- gallery
- etc.
summary: A safe, easy and flexible website creation and administration engine
